  5. Report of Fairgames cancellation debunked, despite Sony's problems with live service PS5 games  Notebookcheck

item.title: ‘All is forgiven’: After being dropped for Metal Gear Solid 5, David Hayter now says it’s ‘my favourite gameplay of the series’ - Video Games Chronicle
